title: "Setup"

A function family in **`ramp.xds`** called `xds_setup()` was developed to construct **`xds`** objects. This is covered in the  **`ramp.xds`** vignette called [Basic Setup](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/BasicSetup.html).
